ja203:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja203:1.1_0: I have good will toward the Virūpakkhas,
ja203:3.1_0: May the footless not harm me!
ja203:3.2_0: May the two-legged not hurt me.
ja203:3.3_0: May the four-legged not hurt me,
ja203:3.4_0: May the many-legged not hurt me.
ja203:4.1_0: All sentient beings, all living things,
ja203:4.3_0: may they see only nice things,
ja203:4.4_0: may bad not come to anyone.
ja203:6.1_0: I’ve made this safeguard, I’ve made this protection:
ja203:6.3_0: I pay homage to the Buddha,
ja203:6.4_0: I revere the seven perfectly awakened Buddhas.”
ja203:7.1_0: and a third from the group of six.
